page.title: 13Pubs and Clubs in Ferryhill
page.content: In our area there are many pubs and clubs.In Ferryhill market place alone there are 4 pubs and a working mens club which makes Ferryhill very popular with people from outlying areas and excursion parties.The pubs in our area are- {Ferryhill} The Black Bull The Kings Head The White Horse The Greyhound The Post Boy {Ferryhill Station The Eldon Arms The Commercial There are also working mens clubs at both Ferryhill and Ferryhill Station; a social club attached to Ferryhill Athletic football ground and a social club attached to the Roman Catholic church. Stobbs Cross and Mainsforth have neither pub nor club.
